robot

Class Communicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Communicator

  • public class Communicator
extends java.lang.Object
    Communicator takes care of the communication between the NXT and the PC part by using bluetooth connection Based on the Original Communicator by professor Glassy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Communicator()
      Start the communicator

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Start connecting and wait for the bluetooth to finish connecting
      void exit()
      Close on exit
      void send(Message m)
      Sends a message to the computer specified by header, x, and y
      void setController(Controller c)
      Sets a controller to control messages from this communicator

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
